author: Justine Coleman
title: Church, pastor accuse Kentucky governor of targeting churchgoers in lawsuit
description: Maryville Baptist Church in Louisville and its pastor Jack Roberts filed a lawsuit against Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear (D) Friday for allegedly targeting churchgoers with the enforcement of the stay-at-home order on ...
content:
Maryville Baptist Church in Louisville and its pastor Jack Roberts filed a lawsuit against Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear (D) Friday for allegedly targeting churchgoers with the enforcement of the stay-at-home order on Easter Sunday.
The lawsuitasserts that Besh… [+2824 chars]
